name: Project Fatal
description:
Project Fatal is a survival horror game which is a demake of the infamous series "Fatal Frame" made by KOEI-TECMO. Adapting a first person view style, player should be able to uncover the tragic story behind Himuro Mansion and face various obstacles within it from defeating the ghosts, to solving the puzzle with the help of camera obskura. Will you be able to escape from the mansion safely? 

 

Development team:
